post.body: Hey @katian i ended up losing my last account. Did you get the chance to check out my link i sent you for the decentralized p2p sharing system?

comment.body: @katian_on_mars: well no of course. I was not saying to actually use this particular one. I m thinking more of a program that is kind of like bit torrent but private. As it grows it gets faster but does not rely on traditional trackers.
